uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.rest.resource

Class ReadWriteRouterServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.restlets.RouterRestlet
      • uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.sal.rest.resource.ReadWriteRouterServlet

  • @Path(value="{path: .*}")
public class ReadWriteRouterServlet
extends RouterRestlet
    ReadWriteRouterServlet "Extension" of ELDA's RouterRestlet to support also Write operations This is a bit of hack as a temporary solution for extending ELDA
    Since:
    11/07/2013
    Author:
    Carlos Pedrinaci (KMi - The Open University)

        Initialise this RouterRestlet. Happens a lot, so expensive initialisations should be cached. Sets the router used by this instance according to the appropriate LDA configs.
